title: My blue essence  trinket has gone
body: i was just selecting my trinket 2 days ago when i realised that the custom ward of the blue essence is gone, just disappeared, pls tell me that you can take it back to me because i spend a lot of blue essence in that ward, it was the  blue essence ward with all the animation when used pls help !!!!

replies.body:
"please tell me that you can return it to me because i spent "

And bug reported, known, announced, and in the process of being fixed.
Yep, yep! We're on the case! {{champion:51}}
The Same thing happen to me..
Also reporting this has happened to me, just noticed today cause hit up Summoner's Rift again after not in a long while.
